title: Camille seems too cyberpunk
body: As much as the champion's design seems interesting, it also seems kind of wrong as a base champion design for LOL.  I mean compared to other technological champs like Vi or Orianna or Blitz, she just doesn't seem to fit thematically in.

replies.body: She's pretty similar to Orianna IMO.
I believe the Piltover Lore thing says it has a lot of different styles. There are just quite a few that are similar
Good. That means there is a distinction with her from other robotic champs.
she looks like she belongs in the project continuity
